name: Commonwealth ex rel. Motley, Appellant, v. Myers

parties: Commonwealth, ex rel. Motley, Appellant, v. Myers.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Order affirmed.
Mr. Justice Cohen took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.

casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth, ex rel. Motley, Appellant, v. Myers.
January 4, 1967:
Submitted November 14, 1966.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Eagen, O’Brien and Egberts, JJ.
Matthew Motley, appellant, in propria persona.
John F. O’Neill, Jr. and Alan J. Davis, Assistant District Attorneys, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for appellee.
